description: This app started well but if you are using Chromium and you want to screen grab then the shortcust keys bring it down, all SKs conflict with Chromium SKs. It doesn't advise when a screen scrape has been copied and if it does it either locks up or you have to open the app to see the screen copy. The biggest issue is it keep locking up and not responding using apps like Libreoffice, Chromium, System Monior etc,,, I'm using Ubuntu 23.04 on a 2021 Lenovo laptop... enough said cheers.
